quotes.quote: Between saying and doing, many a pair of shoes is worn out.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Never buy four C-plus paintings when you can buy one A.
quotes.author: Walter Annenberg

quotes.quote: I think it is all a matter of love: the more you love a memory, the stronger and stranger it is.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: We cannot change anything until we accept it. Condemnation does not liberate, it oppresses.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Perhaps the truth depends on a walk around the lake.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens
